holidays.title: Act Happy Day
holidays.description: No matter what the situation is, chose to stay positive — laugh, smile, and be happy!

holidays.title: Benito Juarez Day
holidays.description: Remember and celebrate the exploits of Mexican icon Benito Juárez on his birthday memorial day.

holidays.title: Black Press Day
holidays.description: Do your bit to support independent journalism. Read, subscribe to, and support Black-owned publications today.

holidays.title: Everything You Do is Right Day
holidays.description: Thank goodness Everything You Do is Right Day follows Everything You Think is Wrong Day!

holidays.title: Freedom of Information Day
holidays.description: Find out more about your right to the freedom to obtain correct information today.

holidays.title: Laylatul Qadr
holidays.description: Learn why Muslims busy themselves in worship and seek repentance on this Ramadan night.

holidays.title: Lips Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Go on, bring out your best smile or pout — it's time to ce-lip-brate!

holidays.title: National Archer Day
holidays.description: If you know anyone named Archer, make them feel extra-special this National Archer Day.

holidays.title: National Artichoke Day
holidays.description: A day to celebrate and chow down on these nutritious, delicious plants.

holidays.title: National Curl Crush Day
holidays.description: Embrace and show off your natural, gorgeous curls on National Curl Crush Day.

holidays.title: National Vaccination Day
holidays.description: Thanks to vaccination and immunization drives, many diseases are virtually unknown to us.

holidays.title: No Selfies Day
holidays.description: Have you realized how integral selfies have become to us? Let’s celebrate by NOT taking selfies.

holidays.title: Robert Goddard Day
holidays.description: Prepare for takeoff as we learn about the first liquid-fueled rocket and its creator.

holidays.title: St. Urho's Day
holidays.description: St. Urho's Day prepares revelers for the forthcoming festivities of St. Patrick’s Day.

holidays.title: Wellderly Day
holidays.description: This Wellderly Day, re-examine what 'old' means and continue living life to the fullest!

holidays.title: Young Carers Action Day
holidays.description: One does not choose the life of a caregiver; it chooses you.

holidays.title: Boo the Pomeranian’s Birthday
holidays.description: From his unique haircut to trendy dog wear, Boo the Pomeranian stole the hearts of many.

holidays.title: Danish Zehen’s Birthday
holidays.description: We pay tribute to the life and career of the "Ace of Space's" brightest star.

holidays.title: Lauren Graham’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let us follow the multi-awarded actress as she leads us to her glamorous ‘Gilmore’ life.

holidays.title: Luca Lombardo’s Birthday
holidays.description: This athlete star is competitively heading for the goal on TikTok. Celebrate him today!
